price: 你说：“这是更好的呢？还是应许敬畏者永居其中的乐园更好呢？它是他们所有的报酬和归宿，
arabic: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qul adhālika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna kānat lahum jazāan wamaṣīran
